name: Psionic Deflection
description: Methods to shield and redirect hostile energy attacks.

cards.title: Creating an Energy Shield
cards.description: Forming an energetic barrier to block and absorb incoming forces.
cards.bulletpoints: Shield Formation, Layered Protection, Psionic Field Reinforcement
cards.summaryText: Cast a layered shield that cushions impact and drinks in stray force.

cards.title: Deflecting and Redirecting Attacks
cards.description: Using psionic control to neutralize and reflect negative forces.
cards.bulletpoints: Redirection Techniques, Energy Absorption, Reverse Flow Manipulation
cards.summaryText: Catch hostile energy, roll it off your field, and send it back cleanly.
